name: Vuskhell Station
description:
Vuskhell Station, also known as Gornom 2, is a horror game. The mystery is here again, and now in the Vuskhell Station.  If you have not played Gornom, it is not recommended to play this game.
 A new employee of the Vuskhell Station arrived for your first night shift and, obviously, it will not be a normal shift. New Creepy Stories came to life.

The use of headphones is recommended.

  CONTROLS:

  • WASD: Walk
  • E: Interact
  • Esc: Pause

A game created by Ciro Ricetti (Cube Legal)              

  • Instagram: @ciroricettinovaes
  • Contact email: cubeindustria@gmail.com

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

 :)
